text: Thieves Like Us is a 1974 American crime thriller movie directed by Robert Altman and starring Keith Carradine, Shelley Duvall, Louise Fletcher and Tom Skerritt. The was based on the novel of the same name by Edward Anderson. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman
title: Thieves Like Us (movie)
